call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - June 26th

decisions.decision: Ergoversary AMA will have four participants: kushti, Dan, Joe, and qx()
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Planning special AMA for Ergoversary celebration
decisions.quote: Okay, so it's me, Dan, Joe, and qx().

commitments.commitment: Special Ergoversary AMA will be held on July 1st
commitments.quote: On July 1st is the Ergoversary. We are going to do a special AMA two days early on July 1st.

commitments.commitment: Chi will build a 6.0 node for storage rent
commitments.quote: We have to ask Chi to build us a 6.0 node for storage rent as well.

key_facts.fact: 6.0 activation will be around October if voting succeeds
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Voting begins around July 12th or July 11th
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Soft forks require 90+ percent agreement to avoid chain splits
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Mining pools do not need to change parameters to vote yes on 6.0, only to vote no
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 5.x nodes will skip validation of new scripts and ignore sub-blocks
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: ErgoHack videos are being released today/yesterday/tomorrow
key_facts.speaker: qx()
